infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to let you take profile photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to let you share photos with your matches.

plugins.photosPermission: The app needs access to your photos to let you share them with your matches.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app needs access to your camera to let you take profile photos.
